title: Organization
description: Represents a collection of people organized together into a community or other social, commercial or political structure for the purposes of education. The group has some common purpose or reason for existence which goes beyond the set of people belonging to it and can act as an Agent. Organizations are often decomposable into hierarchical structures. In the higher education context, it represents an Institution, School, College, Center, Division, and any other organizational unit that can act as an Agent.

createdBy.title: Created By
createdBy.description: The name of the originator (user or system) of the data. This is informational only, do not use in business logic!

createdOn.title: Created On
createdOn.description: The date and time when the entity instance was created

modifiedBy.title: Modified By
modifiedBy.description: The name of the modifier (user or system) of the data. This is informational only, do not use in business logic!

modifiedOn.title: Modified On
modifiedOn.description: The date and time when the entity instance was last modified

id.title: ID
id.description: A globally unique identifier of an organization.

code.title: Code
code.description: A code used to identify an organization.

title.title: Title
title.description: The full name of an organization.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of organization, e.g., "College", "Department", etc.

locations.title: Location
locations.description: The physical locations where an organization may be contacted by mail.

id.title: ID
id.description: A globally unique identifier of an organization's mailing location

description.title: Description
description.description: A full description or comments about the mailing location

type.title: Type
type.description: A type of mailing location for an organization, such as the main office.

locationType.title: Type
locationType.description: A type of location information for an organization.

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the mailing location

preference.title: Preferred Location
preference.description: Whether a mailing location is preferred over others of the same type.

addressLines.title: Address
addressLines.description: The delivery address lines of the person's mailing location, such as a street or post office box number.

place.title: Place
place.description: A country specific postal region.  Postal regions are expressed as a hierarchy of country, region, and sub-region, and as a locality with postal automation codes

country.title: Country
country.description: The country where the person's mailing address is located.

deliveryPoint.title: Delivery Point
deliveryPoint.description: A specific set of digits between 00 and 99 assigned to every address. When combined with the ZIP + 4 code, the delivery point provides a unique identifier for every deliverable address served by the US Postal Service.

carrierRoute.title: Carrier Route
carrierRoute.description: A subdivision of a US zipcode.

correctionDigit.title: Correction Digit
correctionDigit.description: A number used to check for errors in a US ZIP code, delivery point, or carrier route.

phones.title: Phone
phones.description: The phones and phone-connected devices at which an organization can be contacted.

id.title: ID
id.description: A globally unique identifier of a phone.

type.title: Type
type.description: A type of phone for an organization.

phoneType.title: Type
phoneType.description: A type of phone contact for an organization.

preference.title: Preferred Phone
preference.description: Whether a phone is preferred over others of the same type.

countryCallingCode.title: Country Calling Code
countryCallingCode.description: The country calling code of telephone and/or mobile device when dialing internationally.

number.title: Number
number.description: The telephone number of a phone or telephone device.

extension.title: Extension
extension.description: The telephone extension number of a phone or telephone device.

emails.title: Email
emails.description: The email addresses at which an organization can be contacted.

id.description: A globally unique identifier of an email.

type.title: Type

emailType.title: Type

preference.title: Preferred Email
preference.description: Whether an Email is preferred over others of the same type.

socialMedia.title: Social Media
socialMedia.description: The social media addresses at which an organization can be contacted.

id.title: ID
id.description: A globally unique identifier of a social media contact.

type.title: Social Media
type.description: A type of social media account.

socialMediaType.title: Type
socialMediaType.description: A type of social media account.

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of a social media contact information.

preference.title: Preferred Social Media
preference.description: Whether a Social Media contact that is preferred over others of the same type.

address.title: Address
address.description: The username, handle or other address of the social media account.
